Headline: #18 16th/18th Temporary Reroute at Halsted/18th
ShortDescription: 18 16th/18th buses are temporarily rerouted via 18th, Halsted, Cermak, Damen, 188th, then resume their normal route, due to street blockage near Halsted/18th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#18 16th/18th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 18th, Halsted, Cermak, Damen, 188th, then resume their normal route, due to street blockage near Halsted/18th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Green Line Service Delayed at Cicero
ShortDescription: Green Line trains are standing at Cicero. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green Line trains are standing with major delays at Cicero due to fire department activity.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
